title: The Proper Way to Write Love
overview: "I wanted to see him make this kind of face." I was a gloomy nerd in high school, and at that time I was entwined with Washizawa Natsuo â€“ my dark past. Now, a few years later, we have reunited and Natsuo asked me out. This is my chance. We'll go out, then I'll break up with him, leaving him in tatters!
